#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long int gcd(long long int a , long long int b)
 {
 	if(a == 0)
 	 return b;
 	
 	else
 	 return gcd(b % a , a);
 }

int main()
 {
 	int t;
 	cin>>t;
 	
 	while(t--)
 	 {
 	   long long int a,b;
	   cin>>a>>b;
	   
	   if(a == b)
	    {
	    	cout<<"1"<<endl;
		}
	   else
	    {
	      long long int max = a>b?a:b;
	   
	      long long int g = gcd(a , b);
	    
	     if(g == 1)
	      {
	       cout<<max-2<<endl;	
		  }	
	   
	     else
	       {
	    	cout<<(max/g)-2<<endl;
	    	}
	   }
     }
 	return 0;
 }
